markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Summon Water Elemental](/Feats.aspx?ID=2614) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Undine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=314" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 119 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can summon an elemental ally. Once per day, you can cast [_summon elemental_](/Spells.aspx?ID=320) as a 5th-level primal innate spell, but the elemental summoned must be a [water elemental](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=45).
name: Summon Water Elemental
